name: Epic Flood Escape
description:
"The game rocks! Love games like this!"

-Beta tester

Epic Flood Escape is a game where you need to escape a flood. Choose from towers to game modes for more fun and action.

This game is still in beta so you will see stuff and bugs that is not right.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

How To Play:

W A S D: MOVEMENT

Space: JUMP

Shift: RUN FASTER AND JUMP EVEN MORE FAR.

ESC: PAUSE

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
